content: NEW YORK Contractors for U.S. commercial construction are optimistic about the industry's health in the next 12 months though finding skilled labor still poses challenges  according to a third-quarter survey released on Monday.

content: Aug 31 Almost three days before Hurricane Harvey hit Texas  hardware retailer Home Depot Inc received an alert from a weather service and activated its disaster-response plan to get supplies to those in the storm's path  while turning a profit  too.
name: USG Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-As Harvey gained fury  Home Depot raced to respond
